snippet.title: IMMORTAL: And The Death That Follows - Reveal Trailer 2021
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/IMMORTAL_Steam
Mishura Games on Social Media - https://linktr.ee/mishura_games

Develop your own unique fighting style, form your own gang and fight your inner demon while trying to escape an interdimensional prison for demigods.
Immortal is a rogue-like side-scrolling beat-em-up inspired by fighting games and 90s anime.
